snippet: The Air Force Academy said it had begun an investigation of its athletic department and was demanding more accountability from coaches after The Gazette in Colorado Springs reported allegations of lax oversight and misconduct by athletes.
abstract: Air Force Academy begins investigation of its athletic department and is demanding more accountability from coaches after reported allegations of lax oversight and misconduct by athletes.
lead_paragraph: The Air Force Academy said it had begun an investigation of its athletic department and was demanding more accountability from coaches after The Gazette in Colorado Springs reported allegations of lax oversight and misconduct by athletes.
